message: Let's split it 80-20, a fair start!
You didn't take the 80-20, now it's 60-40!
You're getting more aggressive, I'll give you a slightly smaller share!
You're not getting more aggressive? I'm taking 70% now!
You're getting bolder, I'll give you a smaller share, but not that small!
You're not budging? I'll take 75% now, it's getting late!
You're really pushing your luck, I'll give you a tiny share, but not that tiny!
Last chance, I'll take 80% and we can both get something!
You're really stretching it, I'll give you the smallest share possible, but I'm not going to give in completely!
